A placeholder for something cool

Usage: test [OPTIONS] ARGS...

Examples:
# Do a thing
$ test do thing --now

# Do a different thing
$ test do thing --different

Options:
Short	Long		Type	Default	Usage
-h	--help		bool	false	Show help for test
-v	--version	bool	false	Show version info for test

Use "test [command] -h/--help" for more information about a command.
